articles.description: In order to provide a safe environment for women at the workplace, the Yogi Adityanath-led Uttar Pradesh government on Saturday, in an order, stated that no women worker can be bound to do the night shift in factories across the state.
articles.content:
No women worker shall be bound to work without consent after 7 pm, the UP order said. (Representational)
